categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Walix Ve'ra was a Force-sensitive male who served under the reconstituted Sith Empire. He was present in the Imperial Command Center on Ossus during the Empire's invasion of the planet.
Walix Ve'ra serves as a crew-skill trainer for artifice on the Imperial Side at Ossus within the game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
